definitions.definition: A senior secretary or official with administrative or legal duties , sometimes in charge of some area of government such as finance or justice .
examples: Chancellor of the Duchy of Lancaster

subdefinitions.definition: Ellipsis of Chancellor of the Exchequer .

definitions.definition: The head of the government in some German - speaking countries .
A senior record keeper of a cathedral ; a senior legal officer for a bishop or diocese in charge of hearing cases involving ecclesiastical law .
The head of a university , sometimes purely ceremonial .
The chief judge of a court of chancery (that is, one exercising equity jurisdiction ).

main_definition: A senior secretary or official with administrative or legal duties , sometimes in charge of some area of government such as finance or justice .
secondary_definitions: The head of the government in some German - speaking countries .
( Christianity ) A senior record keeper of a cathedral ; a senior legal officer for a bishop or diocese in charge of hearing cases involving ecclesiastical law .
( education ) The head of a university , sometimes purely ceremonial .
( Scots law ) The foreman of a jury .
( US , law ) The chief judge of a court of chancery (that is, one exercising equity jurisdiction ).
